subject: RE: [junit] Where am I going wrong?

messageBody:

>burn store. It would be different if we were in a language
>with full lexical
>scoping like Scheme or Pop11, and the variable was captured by

Oh my goodness, another human being that has heard of POP11! I was begining to think that I was the only one! Is anyone using POP11 these days or did it never really make it out of the university labs?

I used it at Plymouth Polytechnic (back before it got a name change and made a university) in England back in the late 80's.

Simon
